channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for SC
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for SC

item.title: Report X-2023120929
item.description:
Report X-2023120929

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-30T17:46:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-16
  • City: FORT MILL
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was damaged during transit or during unloading phase. Package was found at the head of 100 belt line and that belt's QA notified me immediately. Package was assessed and placed in hazmat bag and isolated in our QA cage. DescribePack: Plastic drum was cracked on its base which caused granules to leak from package. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package handlers loading outbound hazmats should brace properly or if package was damaged during the unloading phase at our station, package handlers should assure to take proper hazmat handling steps to ensure plastic pails do not crack.

item.title: Report X-2023120995
item.description:
Report X-2023120995

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-30T17:46:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-19
  • City: GREENVILLE
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE DISCOVERED ON THE ROLLERS IN THE UNLOAD BY DOOR 6; ODOR WAS EMINATING FROM PACKAGE, AND NOTICED THE BOTTOM OF THE OUTER PACKAGING APPEARED DAMP. UPON INSPECTION, THE INSIDE OF THE BOX WAS DAMP ON THE BOTTOM AND THERE WAS A MINUT AMOUNT OF LIQUID POOLED IN THE OUTER BAG BETWEEN THE BOX AND THE JUG. DescribePack: NO CRACKS, HOLES, OR PUNCTURE. LEAKAGE DETERMINED TO BE FROM THE CAP. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE WAS IMMEDIATELY PLACED IN RED HAZMAT BIN AND BROUGHT TO THE HAZMAT CAGE TO BE PLACED UNDER THE VENTILATOR.
